name: Buying a Gameboy
description:
Buy a gameboy. D&D style, I guess. 

Gameboy art and Soldyah console art cant be triggered in game, some bugs. Just gonna put it in screenshots cause why not? Who plays a game without previews or screenshots?

The game's not really done, the game doesn't restart when you die, but oh well, that's what happen when you focus too much on development and skip debugging, last day should always be about debugging :( Only had some time to debug, but oh well, can't wait to learn about the mistakes!
